name: FPS Adventure
description:
Welcome to FPS Adventure, an adventure through a shooter game inside a computer.

Story Mode: 

SIRUV has started to corrupt the internet's core and it's your mission to save the internet from extinction. Go through 11 different levels. Each one has challenges you need to do to unlock the part of the gun you need. Once you have found all the parts, combine them to make an almighty, powerful gun that's the only way to defeat SIRUV from his evil plans. Everyone is counting on you, Chosen One. We believe in you.

Online Modes:

Only 1 trophy. 60 Players. 1 winner. Go all out in a 60 player battle royale and win the Trophy of Victory. Go in a team, or do it solo. Either your victory is shared between a team, or you claim it for yourself. Too hard for you? Try 30v30. 2 teams of 30 go out and battle together. What are you waiting for? Claim that Trophy!

Don't have a PC to run it? Fear not. FPS Adventure will come out on Mobile and Console.

(Battle Royale will be free. Story Mode is paid.)
